 Puzzle: 
  There 4 different types of food: cranberry, eggplant, orange, watermelon
The people have 4 different hobbies: collecting, filmmaking, singing, writing
The people have 4 different jobs: engineer, pilot, security-guard, writer
The people perfer 4 different movie-genres: epic, fantasy, martial-arts, time-travel
The people prefer 4 different music-genres: dubstep, indie, techno, trance
The people prefer 4 different types of sport: badminton, ice-hockey, skiing, surfing
The people use 4 different means of transport: ship, skateboard, taxi, tram

1. the person eating watermelon is somewhere to the left of the person who's sport is badminton##5
2. the person watching martial-arts movies is on the left or right of the person driving the taxi##3
3. the person driving the tram is on the right of the person watching fantasy movies
4. the person who's sport is surfing is the person watching fantasy movies
5. the security-guard is on the left of the person who's sport is surfing
6. the person eating eggplant is in an odd position##4
7. the person who's hobby is writing is somewhere to the right of the security-guard##5
8. the person who's hobby is filmmaking is the person who's sport is skiing
9. the person watching epic movies is on the right of the person watching martial-arts movies
10. the person watching fantasy movies is the writer
11. the fan of indie is on the far left or far right##3
12. the person who's sport is ice-hockey is on the left or right of the person eating orange##3
13. the person watching martial-arts movies is the person driving the ship
14. the person watching time-travel movies is on the far right
15. the person who's sport is badminton is the pilot
16. the person eating eggplant is somewhere to the left of the person watching epic movies##5
17. the person who's sport is ice-hockey is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is singing##3
18. the person eating orange is somewhere to the left of the fan of techno##5
19. the security-guard is the fan of trance
20. the person watching epic movies is the person who's sport is ice-hockey

  Solution: 
#############
|                |      1        |       2         |     3       |      4       |
| Food           |   eggplant    |                 |             |              |
| Hobby          |               |                 |             |              |
| Job            |               |                 |             |              |
| Movie-Genre    |               |                 |             |              |
| Music-Genre    |               |                 |             |              |
| Sport          |               |                 |             |              |
| Transport      |               |                 |             |              |
#############
